price: Enti wͻn nhwε ͻsoro a εwͻ wͻn apampamu no, sεdeε Yεsi abͻ no, asiesie no a tokuro anaa apaepaeε biara nni mu?
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَيۡفَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afalam yanẓurū ilā al-samāi fawqahum kayfa banaynāhā wazayyannāhā wamā lahā min furūjin
